description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested to 25 CFSD Montreal by April 2024...please refer to attached document
duration_in_months: Bid Submission: Expiration Date: March 8, 2024: Closing Time: 2:00 PM (Local Time)
full_summary:
=================
# Government Tender Announcement

### Solicitation Number: W8485-248071/A

#### Title: Regulator, Oxygen, Diluter Demand

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of fluid and gas regulators. The solicitation number for this opportunity is W8485-248071/A.

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** January 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 8, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 23, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

### Goods and Services

The government is looking for the following items:

* **Hose Assembly, Metallic:** NSN: 4720-01-153-9780, Quantity: 72, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal.

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model and/or part number and NCAGE they are offering.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement opportunity is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* **Region of Opportunity:** World
* **Region of Delivery:** Quebec (except NCR)

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this opportunity is the Department of National Defence. Contact information is as follows:

* MCpl Poissant-Viau
* Phone: 00
* Email: audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

Tender documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The following links provide access to the tender documents:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30297/w8485-248071.a---amd-002-bid-solicitation-%28en.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/t
